outputs.output_descr: The project is aimed to support three main goals, which are conflict prevention and peace building, social infrastructure development, and calacity building of the educational system in the Beslan town of the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania. Towards this end, the project is designed to achieve the following immediate objectives: (1) to improve coditions for the development of physical and educational potential of Beslan's youth through the construction of a modern boarding school in the town of Beslan; (2) to render technical assistance to the respective governmental bodies and non-governmental structures to strengthen the capacity of the educational system in the Republic; (3) to provide assistance to the victims of the terrorist attack and hostage taking of early September 2004, and thus support the recovery of Beslan's population.

project_title: Beslan school construction / Social infrustructure suppo
